pages.text: Unlike every other civilization, the Ancients understood and even embraced the Void upon discovering its true power.$(br2)When exposed to the Void, most materials disintegrate under the tension, but some bind even closer together. Both resources obtained from Purpur Remnants exhibit the latter.

pages.title: Reference Pages
pages.text: At this point, the $(bold)Catalog$() is of use. Regardless of your progress, it provides a brief explanation of any topic, either to refresh your memory or as a reference for new concepts.$(br2)The first two pages of the above entry should allow your advance.
